name: foppishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a man dresses or behaves foppishly, he seems to be extremely interested in his appearance, and enjoys wearing decorative clothes: He wore a long jacket and a foppishly floppy necktie. He dressed foppishly, always wearing a large flower in his buttonhole.
More examplesFewer examplesHe was dressed as foppishly as usual.Foppishly dressed and over-polite, he always gets what he wants - but not without annoying everyone around him.He was always on the lookout for someone to foppishly hang around bars with.
